result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael William Voigt

records.addlTxt: Status conference on November 17, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Notice of bail bond forfeiture returned
$750 cash bond to cover warrants in Burnett County cases 21CF304 and 22CM02

1:09 PM Cases 21CF304 and 22CM2 called together.  Defendant Michael William Voigt not in court.  Attorney Chris A Gramstrup appeared by video for Michael William Voigt.  Attorney Kevin Thomas Schmidt in court for State of Wisconsin. Case on for Status Conference.  Def fails to appear.  Court reviews for service.  Atty Gramstrup notes- unable to reach the def by mail, phone, or leave a VM.  State requests warrant.  Court orders warrant, $750 cash- only judge may quash.  Court orders cash bond forfeited.
Status conference on September 26, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Status conference on September 23, 2022 at 09:00 am.

2:27 PM Cases 21CF304 and 22CM2 called together.  Defendant Michael William Voigt appeared by phone.  Attorney Chris A Gramstrup appeared by video for Michael William Voigt.  Prosecuting attorney Kevin Thomas Schmidt in court for the State of Wisconsin. Case on for Status Conference.  Defense attorney updates the Court: appointed today, Pollak to be removed.  Gramstrup needs time to review and talk to the defendant.
Status conference scheduled for September 23, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Status conference on September 1, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

10:47 AM Cases 21CF304 and 22CM2 called together.  Prosecuting attorney Kevin Thomas Schmidt in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Michael William Voigt appeared by video.  Attorney Gabriel Andres Pollak in court for Michael William Voigt. Case on for Status Conference.  Defense attorney updates the Court: offer has been discussed, possibly contingent on programming and def looking into that, requesting STC.
Status conference scheduled for September 1, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Status conference on June 23, 2022 at 10:00 am.

09:53 AM Cases 21CF304 and 22CM2 called together.  Defendant, Michael William Voigt, appeared with Attorney Gabriel Andres Pollak.  Attorney James Jay Rennicke appeared for the State.  Def by phone with court approval.  Case on for Status Conference.  Defense attorney updates the Court: def to do programming as part of offer, requests additional status to facilitate that.  Status conference scheduled for June 23, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Status conference on May 6, 2022 at 09:00 am.

11:43 AM Cases 21CF34 and 22CM02 called together.  Defendant, Michael William Voigt, appeared with Attorney Gabriel Andres Pollak.  Attorney Kevin Thomas Schmidt appeared for the State.  Michael William Voigt appeared telephonically with Attorney by video means.  Case 21CF34 on for Arraignment.  Defendant acknowledges receipt of information, def. waives reading.  Court informs def. of charges, possible penalties and rights.  NG plea entered to all counts.  Bond continues.  Def to call and update his address.  Status conference scheduled for May 6, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Status conference on March 14, 2022 at 11:45 am.

03:39 PM Cases 21CF304 and 22CM02 called together.  Defendant, Michael William Voigt, appeared with Attorney Gabriel Andres Pollak.  Attorney Kevin Thomas Schmidt appeared for the State.   Case 21CF304 on for Waiver of Preliminary Hearing:  Court informs def of rights to PH; waived by def.  Court finds waiver of right to PH knowingly, freely, voluntarily made.  Court finds factual basis for bind over.  State files information.  Court will allow def to appear for ARGN by phone.  Arraignment scheduled for March 14, 2022 at 11:45 am.
Status conference on February 28, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

03:35 PM Cases 21CF304 and 22CM02 called together.  Defendant Michael William Voigt in court with attorney Gabriel Andres Pollak.  Defendant in custody appearing from Burnett County Jail  James Jay Rennicke appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Michael William Voigt appeared by video means with Attorney.  Case is on for preliminary hearing.  State calls first witness, Deputy Mitchel Olson, who is sworn in and testifies.  Court advises def of right to appear in person, def wants to appear in person.  Atty Pollak makes a statement- clarifies situation for defendant.  Def wishes to be in person.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 28, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

records.addlTxt: Letter from DA re: Copy of summons and complaint to defendant

Bond to cover Burnett County cases 21CF304 and 21GF339.  No contact with the victim or residence.  Maintain absolute sobriety.  No use or possession of illegal drugs, substances, or paraphernalia.
